definition: to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)

sentences.english: We give them a sense of humor because laughter leaven life.
sentences.chinese: 我們要給予他們幽默感，因爲笑聲可以使生活更輕鬆。

sentences.english: Jiangsu building work accomplished thus gave high evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 對江蘇建設工作，汪光燾給予了高度評價。

sentences.english: At last, the basic principle of wide-range temperature operation and automatic temperature control system are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對寬溫工作的基本方法和自動控制系統給予了分析。

sentences.english: The Commission or training institution may give reward to those who are outstanding in performance.
sentences.chinese: 成績特優者，由本會或訓練機構給予獎勵。

sentences.english: Begging is to request a donation in a supplicating manner.
sentences.chinese: 乞討是以請求的方試去要求給予捐贈。

sentences.english: We are glad to see, newspaper can give community citizen reportorial chance.
sentences.chinese: 我們高興看到，報紙能給予社區市民報道機會。

sentences.english: Benik is one of the young kids about, and it was a terrific finish.
sentences.chinese: 但是他是一個我們給予很大希望的小孩之一。

sentences.english: Every Chinese government instituted some protective policies for cattle and horses.
sentences.chinese: 歷代政府對耕牛和馬都給予了保護性的政策。

sentences.english: What ever the accuser said, he could give corresponding refutation.
sentences.chinese: 不論控方說什麼，他都能給予相應的駁斥。

sentences.english: After surgery you will be given intravenous fluids (IV’s) in your arm.
sentences.chinese: 手術後，你將在手臂上被給予靜脈輸液。

sentences.english: Control group were not treated with sensory reeducation or oral intake of methycobal.
sentences.chinese: 對照組未給予感覺再訓練及口服彌可保片劑治療。

sentences.english: referring jaundiced babies for diagnosis and possible treatment;
sentences.chinese: 對有黃疸的嬰兒進行診斷並給予可能的治療。

sentences.english: The safest form is to nod and give a verbal salutation.
sentences.chinese: 最安全的方式就是點頭，並給予口頭稱呼。

sentences.english: Recognize the importance of gie and take.
sentences.chinese: 認識到給予和獲得的重要性。

sentences.english: Kumaratunga highly complimented the stance of China.
sentences.chinese: 庫馬拉通加夫人對中方的這一立場給予高度評價。

sentences.english: But last year, McDonald's Premium coffee got some good press.
sentences.chinese: 但去年麥當勞貼水咖啡給予很好的壓力。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
to repay a favor/to give back/feedback
to be capable of/to be able to/can
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
variant of 給予|给予[ji3 yu3]
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
